name: Nick Spaghettijohn's House of Noodle
description:
Don your VR Headset, enter the House of Noodle, and immerse yourself as Nick Spaghettijohn, the ultimate pasta-flinging son-of-a-gun.

This was a game made for Global Game Jam 2019, it was made in a weekend and has some known flaws: 

  • No way to restart the scene or exit. Once you are in the noodle house you belong there forever. (I got by exiting through the SteamVR Overlay. I'm sorry)
  • Sauce blobs aren't limited, and it isn't super optimized, so you can sauce yourself out of the game. I'm not sorry about this one.
  • Only tested with the HTC Vive, it may work for other headsets (with motion controls) but I don't know for sure.

If you want to check out the code (you really shouldn't), you can view the GitHub repo here: https://github.com/leafdj/GGJ2019
